import React from "react"; import styles from "./portraitCard.module.css"; import { ReactComponent as WatchListIconEmpty } from "../../assets/icons/watchlist-icon-empty.svg"; import { ReactComponent as InformationIcon } from "../../assets/icons/information-icon.svg"; import { ReactComponent as WatchListIconLike } from "../../assets/icons/watchlist-icon-like.svg"; const PortraitCard = ({ watchlisted = null }) => { const imageUrl = `https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568896597888-d674b61e7067?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1355&q=80`; const video = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/A-eobLIY-yE"; const portraitCardStyles = { background: `url(${imageUrl})`, backgroundPosition: "center", backgroundSize: "cover" }; return (
{/* STATIC PORTRAIT CARD */}
Terminator: Dark Fate
1 season
{/* DYNAMIC PORTRAIT CARD */}
